Comments_List: More than anything, I believe I developed a voice. This class also forced me to consider the importance of voice and perspective in documentary storytelling.

This course provided me with knowledge of the history of documentary photography, the cultural production of documentary film, and insight into documentary work-- especially, the ethical questions faced by practitioners.
I gained a broad knowledge of the evolution of documentary across genre, and medium. I also gained skills for close observation.
No weaknesses. At times I do wish we focused our discussion on specific films/texts.
Yes. This course was a solid introduction into the history of documentary film. It provided a lot of information in a small period of time and I enjoyed writing the open responses.
Yes, a solid broad intro. If people think they will focus in genre or medium it would be a frustrating class.
